page.description: Returns the larger of two numbers.
page.syntax: Largest_Number as N = MAX(N number_1,N number_2)

return.name: Largest_Number
return.description: Returns the larger of the two input values, *[xb:number_1]* or *[xb:number_2]*.

page.discussion: MAX() returns the larger of two numbers. For example:
page.example:
dim val1 as N dim val2 as N
val1 = round(rand()*200,0) val2 = round(rand()*200,0)
?val1 = 79
?val2 = 132
?max(val1,val2) = 132
